t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[6]: Raba ingene ubaza ningoga ikibazo gihambaye mu kiganiro.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[14: Ntuhagarike gufata gushika igikorwa c’ugufata gihere.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[15: Tangura igikorwa co gufata amasanamu imbere yuko utangura kandi ntuhagarike bidaheze.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[31: Guma hamwe. Ugutekana kurafasha uwo ariko araguha ikiganiro gutekana nawe
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[28: Kwibanda ikintu kimwe nkenegwa kugira utange inkuru yumvikana kadi ngufi.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[57: Inkuru iyariyo yose ifise ikibazo gihambaye.n’ikihe kibazo wishuye mu mpera y’inkuru yawe?
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[25: Iyumvire abantu ugomba kubwira inkuru yawe mugihe uzoba uriko uratora ico ukorako canke ngene uyikora
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[46: Koresha ibibazo vy’iyongerako nimba mukeneye inkuru nyinshi
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[12: Raba ko igice gihambaye y’ivyo mwafashe bikwije ibice 50% vya kadre.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[13: Shira hamwe ama clips atanganya ubunini canke atandukanye kugira uronke agace gakwiye
t_video_library::quiz_card_topic::choice: A Day in the Life Story
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[45: Nimba ikibazo cawe kitaronse inyishu ikwiye, hindura ingene ubaza ikibazo.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[41: Mu bantu benshi, fata uri kure yabo bantu benshi kugira uronke ijwi ryiza , bwira uwo muntu akurabe mu maso
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[9]: Heza ikiganiro ubaza: hari ikintu mushaka kongerako ?
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[3]: Kugira insiguro y’ijambo rimwe y’iyo nkuru yawe ku bantu bawe
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[35: Ukugenza neza birafasha mukukwizera bikanateza imbere ibiganiro vyawe
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[42: Nimba hari umuyaga,shira camera yawe ahadashika umuyaga,canke uwuzibire n’umubiri wawe canke igihome.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[16: Ntushire uwo muntu wawe hagati mw’ifoto.koresha uburyo bw’uduce dutatu
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[17: Nimba ifoto yawe itari nziza, ntimwegereye bikwiye – Robert Capa.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[18: Bandanya ufata gushika nkamasegonda 15,nimba clip ari nini, yikate
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[20: Kugira ufate amasanamu murakenera kugabura ibintu bigize inkuru yawe kimwe kimwe ukwaco
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[60: Ibaze kuri clip yose :mbega ariko ambwira ikintu gishasha ?
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[27: Iyo uriko urafata amajwi y’ikiganiro, tegura ibibazo bigera kuri 15
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[58: Ikintu gihambaye ni inyishu y’iyo ngorane ituma n’uwumviriza aguma yumviriza.ntumuhebere hakiri kare.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[8]: Inkuru yawe izoryoha uvugishije abantu badasangiye ivyiyumviro
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[5]: Shira imbere ibibazo vyanyu hama toramwa igice c’inkuru ikenewe mukeneye
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[59: Ikintu gikenewe n’inyishu y’ikibazo gikwega abakumviriza. Tubahebere hakiri kare.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[67: Tubwire ngene ibizokurikira bizoba bimeze igihe bizoshika
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[40: Ntiwinyiganyize.nimba mushaka gukora kukindi.hagarika ugufta .hindura isanamu zawe hama tangura gufta gushasha
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[64: Tubwire igitegekanywa kuri iyo ngorane muri kazoza
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[34: Baza ibibazo bigoye mugabo mwibukeinyifato nziza.ikibazo kibajijwi murupfasoni gishika kure.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[43: Ntubaze ibibazo vyugaye bishobora kwishugwa n’ijambo rimwe nka ego canke oya.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[0]: Kwiga kumenyana ; kwibuka ivyo wiyumvira kubandi kandi ntubireke ngo bigukoresha mukuntu uza gukora inkuru yawe.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[61: Urukurikirane rwiza rutegerezwa gukorwa ufatiye kumasanamu atanu akaze.ufise n’izindi ni vyiza kuzongerako
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[7]: Mu kiganiro cawe, ntiwibagire kwatagufyina muga avuge vyo
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[26: Naho umwanya ari muke,tegura ngene ukora hama ntufotore ivyo ubona vyose
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[62: Tubwire bimwe bimwe bikenewe bijanye n’iyo ngorane canke kuberiki iyo ngorane yatanguye.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[44: Gerageza ugume umuvugisha. Baza :kuberiki ?n’igiki cabaye munyuma?ushatse kuvuga iki?
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[32: Nukumenya ico ushaka gukura mu kiganiro.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[1]: Iyo muriko mufata amafoto mu bihe biteye ubwoba,rondera imisi yose aho uzibukirira.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[54: Umuco mukeya utuma ufata amafoto atameze neza.gufata amafoto hanze canke ahantu hashika izuba kugira uronke umuco mwinshi.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[19: Imisi yose shiramwo ibara ryera iyo muhinduye urumuri
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[50: Ibimashine bigira urwamo rwinshi. Bizimye nimba bishoboka canke hindura ikibanza bishobotse.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[66: Tubwire ingene ibintu bigenda birahinduka murivyo biriko biraba
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[52: Nimba isoko ry’umuco riva inyuma y’ico kintu,ico kintu kizoba kitaboneka canke kigoye kubona.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[22: Tangura gufata imbere yuko ubaza ikibazo kugira ugire amasegonda make yagacerere imbere yukuvuga
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[63: Tubwire ingene ingorane igenda ihinduka inyishu kubikogwa vy’abantu biyo nkuru.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[51: Fata uwo muntu wawe hamwe n’isoko ry’umuco bitumbereye kuri we.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[49: abantu benshi hamwe namabarabara yuzuye bagira urwamo rwinshi.ntufatire amajwi y’ibiganiro imbere y’abantu benshi canke mu mabarabara yuzuye
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[48: Nimba hariho umuyaga, shira camera yawe ahatari umuyaga canke ukingire micro yawe
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[47: Mwibuke atamajwi meza yamasanamu yawe avuga igice c’inkuru
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[37: Urabe neza ko ico kintu cawe giteguye neza , kandi ntubihindure n’ikindi kintu muri kadre.
t_video_library::text_card_0::text: Making a great video story involves a variety of clips. These templates will guide you to get all the clips you need to tell a variety of stories.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[30: Sigura neza ibijanye n’ivyo uza gukora canke ivyushaka mugusaba ikiganiro
t_video_library::quiz_card_topic::questi: Choose the story you want to make.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[10: Ivyo wafashe bimeze neza bifise ikibanza mu ntumbero y’ico wariko urakorerako canke birakurikirana
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[56: Mwisanamu,ijwi n’igice c’inkuru,wame uvyibuka iyo uriko urafata amasanamu.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[65: Tubwire ibintu bihambaye ku nkuru yivyabaye canke kuberiki ivyo bishika
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[24: Koresha ijwi ryawe gake gashoboka.vuga iyo nkuru ukoresheje amajwi yabandi
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[38: Tora ahantu heza kugira ufate hama fata neza kadre gushika bihere
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[39: Ntuhagarike guhema kwawe,tegura neza ifoto yawe,hema.igihe ifoto yawe igumye hamwe,tangura gufata
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[36: Umviriza urwamo rwoba ruraho rushobora konona akanovera k’inkuru yawe imbere yo gufata.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[55: Imico iri ku metero zishika 3 kure y’uwo muntu zirahenda
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[53: Nimba mushobora kumva isoko ry’umuco inyuma yizosi ryawe ku munsi haka izuba.muzoronka umuco ubereye
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[29: Fata ivyubona hamwe n’ibiganiro ubonye ubwambere aho hose bishobotse.
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[11: Ubunini bw’ikintu muri kadre butegerezwa kuba bungana n’akamaro bufise muri uwo mwanya-Alfred Hitchcock
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[23: Raba neza urugero rwamajwi ukoresheje ama ecouteurs imbere y’ugufata amajwi.
t_video_library::title: Make a Video Story
t_video_library::tip_collection::tips[2]: Rondera ibikenewe kuri uyo muntu imbere yukugirana nawe ikiganiro.muca mubaza ibibazo bikomeye.
